## Source: ossf-package-analysis (b7dbb9d0364d3e2b9efec40fc7a2ecdca02406774e6a4359423e6357cf9647e4)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'littest' @ 0.3.1 (crates.io) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
